#Core Blast

Chisel cardio and glute Chisel. I'm pushing harder even though I don't go as fast as some people 😊. Sweat up a storm today 💦💦💦. Now I can go enjoy this gorgeous warm weather today!  Have a Great one!!👊👊👊

La verticale sulle mani è la base della ginnastica, la maggior parte dei movimenti ginnici passa o termina alla verticale.  Per una buona verticale serve CORE (un ottimo controllo del corpo) e SPALLE (mobili e forti). Lo dico sempre nelle mie lezioni, un ginnasta é addome e spalle (soprattutto per i movimenti in appoggio). Usate le DITA per controllare la vostra verticale, SPALLE ALLINEATE E ATTIVE (spingete il terreno verso il basso) TESTA DENTRO, SGUARDO ALLE MANI, BARICENTRO CENTRALE SOPRA LE MANI, CORPO TESO (addome e glutei contratti) e PIEDI UNITI.

Due minuti in verticale cercando di non muovere le mani....l'ho persa un po'...soprattutto verso la fine, avambracci un po' affaticati...c'è da lavorare... #handstandchallenge #dueminutinverticaleferma  #gymnastics #crossfitgymnastics #handstand #core #shoulders #gymnasticslab #crossfiterba

WHAT IS THE FASTEST WAY TO BUILD A SRONG CORE?

Is it by:
1.  Overhead Squat
2.  Goblet Squat
3.  Back squat
4.  Front squat
5.  Hack squat 
6. All of the above

Most people think the answer to a strong core is doing crunches and planks. While it is true that those exercises might have some benefits. They do not challenge your entire body as much as an overhead squat or simple back squat. So if you want the best bang for your buck, just SQUAT🏋🏻 Leave your answers in the comment section below.Also sign up for my new SEMI-PRIVATE training class to learn the secrets of training for peak performance #crossfit #core #fitness #squat #massage #curves #legs #powerlifting #selfmotivated #fitbody #paleo #fitmom #exercise #diet #fitguy #yoga #pilates #run #nyc #trackandfield #influencer #fitfam #absworkout #kettlebell #legsfordays #ad #abs #strong #gymaddict #physique

Day 6, Challenge 6: ARMS (& a little bit of core because I couldn't help myself) 🙋🏼 Ladies, tag your bestie and give this HIIT arm session a go 💪🏼
Training arms DOES NOT make you 'bulky' beautiful ladies- it makes you lean, strong and a total boss!
12 exercises, 40 sec on, 20 sec recovery, 2 rounds 💪🏼 Let's go get it girls!
1. Flex ion Cuff rotations (steering)
2. Round the world
3. Rows
4. Rocky roads
5. Abduction cuff rotations 
6. Tricep raises
7. Elevated press up into single arm rows
8. Elevates arm reaches
9. Elevated walk outs (burns the core)
10. Elevated side plank feed indeed
11. Weighted Russian twist into raise
12. Controlled sit up into punch
Wearing @freddyukireland leggings @fableticseu crop 😍 & of course my @fitbiteurope
